title: Toon Boom Studio v4.0 for Mac OSX
description:
This application is Toon Boom Studio v4.0 for mac osx, which is the award winning animation software that is highly acclaimed by beginners, hobbyists and professionals alike.





When using toon boom studio compared to other animation softwares, the difference is staggering and this is partly to do with toon boom studio's built in graphics/animating rendering engine, which makes animations look incredibly vivid with great colours and high production quality.





Toon boom studio has some great features too, such as smooth integrating with hardware like graphics tablets and can support file codecs of software like photoshop and illustrator, plus many more.





If you're using a graphics tablet as your main input of drawing and animating, some of toon booms drawing features can help and you can adjust the input and pressure you apply to your graphics tablet and can choose different line shapes according to what you are creating onscreen.





There are also numerous effects and adjustments for animators who prefer traditional methods like scanning in frames and mouse vector drawing.





Generally however, toon boom studio 4 has a very intuitive, well laid out and easy to understand user interface, which can make learning to animate a lot easier and help the user to get as much out of the software as possible.




All in all, this animation software is highly recommended if you are planning on making vibrant, Great looking and professional level animations and is a must download for people seeking top quality animating and features.




Notes:

The installation file is the full version of Toon Boom Studio 4 and will fully work without registering it. However, if you register this version of toon boom you get software updates and other toon boom related software. You won't really need to update this version of toon boom as it is still excellent out of the box.


To Install, open the dmg file, follow instructions in the installer setuo, then drag the file image into the applications folder, open toon boom and you should be ready to go.


This software may only work for mac systems with osx 4 tiger and above.




Should also work on Both Power Pc Macs and Intel Macs.




The minimum memory requirement for this software to be run smoothly is at least 1gb of ram.




If you're system is below 1gb of ram, don't worry as it will still work just fine but loading times might take a little bit longer than normal. It should still work okay though.




This software is based on the cd version and the software install file is directly transferred from the package installation cd so it should work briskly and efficiently.



Make sure to look out for my other files in the near future.




And remember to seed this torrent well.




This is a great animation software and clearly shows what toon boom is capable of making, so use this software well and enjoy!




Regards





Chris s.
